com.communote.server.api.core.blog

Interface TopicPermissionManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PermissionManagement<Blog,CreationBlogTO,BlogAccessException>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopicPermissionManagementImpl

    public interface TopicPermissionManagement
extends PermissionManagement<Blog,CreationBlogTO,BlogAccessException>
    Permission management for topics
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_CREATE_TOPIC
      If set, the user is allowed to create topics
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_DELETE_TOPIC
      If set, the user is allowed to delete the topic.
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_EDIT_ACCESS_CONTROL_LIST
      If set, the user is allowed to edit the users access list of the topic.
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_EDIT_DETAILS
      If set, the user is allowed to edit the topics details, like tags, description, etc..
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_INVITE_USER
      If set, the user is allowed to invite other users to the topic.
      static Permission<Blog> PERMISSION_VIEW_TOPIC_DETAILS
      If set, the user is allowed to view the topic's details, like tags, description etc..

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.communote.server.api.core.security.permission.PermissionManagement

        addPermissionFilter, getPermissions, getPermissions, getPermissionsForCreation, hasAndGetWithPermission, hasPermission, hasPermission, hasPermissionForCreation, removePermissionFilter

        If set, the user is allowed to edit the topics details, like tags, description, etc..
